name: Zombie Slayer (itch) (rathgir)
description:
Just a small game I made over the course of a few weeks while I learned how to use Unity. It's not much, and a lot of things like an option screen or scoreboard or missing. However, I'm still proud of completing the goals I set when I decided on this little personal project!

WASD to Move

Mouse to Aim and Shoot

Assets used:

Unity Learn Course Library

Easy Primitive People by Bit Gamey

Retro Games Sound FX by chaosicc

8Bit Music by GWriterStudio
